page.title: 13Changes in 48 years in Skeg.
page.content: My Gran lives at 36 Seaview Flats and she has lived in Skegness for 48 years.She came to live in Skegness when she was 15 years old.She has told me about some of the changes she's seen in Skegness.On Lumley Road the fronts of Victorian shops were more impressive.There were no slot machines and roads were much quieter. It was often busy at nights because of the night trips. There used to be Butlins Amusements were Bottons is.The Hotel on South Parades are now flats. Parade Cinema is the Penny Parade Amusements and the Centre Cinema is the Bingo Club on Roman Bank across the road from the Library. The pier had shows and a theatre. On Seaview car park there were shops and and an African Village. One day a man put his head in the lion's mouth and the lion killed him.
